text: Jerzy Łapiński (born Jerzy Gaździński; 2 November 1940 - 14 May 2020) was a Polish actor. He was born in Lublin, Poland. His career began in 1960. He was known for voice dubbing Cornelius Fudge in the Harry Potter movies in Polish and as Poodle in the 2000 comedy movie A Very Christmas Story. Łapiński died on 14 May 2020, aged 79.Eminent freedom fighter Bhabani Charan Patnaik passes away ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Polish movie actors Category:Polish television actors Category:Polish voice actors Category:Polish stage actors
title: Jerzy Łapiński
